column1: Hisor has a hot-summer Mediterranean climate (Köppen climate classification Csa). The average annual temperature is 14.1 °C (57.4 °F). The warmest month is July with an average temperature of 23.9 °C (79.2 °F) and the coolest month is January with an average temperature of 1.7 °C (35.1 °F). The average annual precipitation is 568mm (22.4") and has an average of 90.5 days with precipitation. The wettest month is March with an average of 107.2mm (4.2") of precipitation and the driest month is August with an average of 0.8mm (0.03") of precipitation.
